participant_1.name: Liam
participant_1.personality: Hardworking and passionate about nature, with a love for music and animals.
participant_1.background: i help tend the fields. my father is a farmer. i like to listen to rock music while working. i've three arabian horses.

participant_2.name: Sophie
participant_2.personality: Creative and resilient, with a vibrant personality and a love for bright colors.
participant_2.background: i just broke up with my boyfriend two months ago. i have a pet fish. my favorite color is orange. i turned 18 years old yesterday.

content.text: On The Ball, City, the oldest football song in the world.
